EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Head in the Clouds/Sponsor Email 7-19-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you Cloud Foundry curious? Dive into SpringOne Platform 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Get your head in the clouds
So what is all the hubbub about? What does the Cloud Native movement mean for Spring developers? Are new things happening in highly distributed applications, platforms, and CD technology that you don’t know about? Join industry and Pivotal leaders like Sam Ramji, Cornelia Davis, Casey West, Justin Smith, Jessica Frazelle, Kenny Bastani, Nicole Forsgren, and many more to find out. Time is running out so register now <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>, book your hotel <[[https://aws.passkey.com/event/14801722/owner/1464789/home]]>. Don’t forget to scroll down, and check out the wide variety of sponsors that will be there to enrich your experience!
Pre-conference training July 31—Aug 1st
Pivotal Education offers a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne conference. Register now for these in-depth trainings on the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies - only 3 classes left that haven’t sold out! Registration will close 7/22/2016.
Building Big Data Solutions <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#building-big-data-solutions]]> Spring Boot Primer <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-boot-primer]]> Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-data-flow]]>

Join the conversation at SpringOne Platform 2016!

We hope to see you there, The Pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io]]> team
